item.title: New Year Wishes 2019
item.description: Happy New Year to Everyone! Figure 1: Welcome 2019

item.title: Resources for Academia
item.description: The Effort Report: Elizabeth and Roger talk about things happening around academia, such as research, teaching, grant writing, collaboration, mentoring, advising, making a successful career, academic writing, attending meetings, applying for faculty positions, and the list goes on. Mathematical Writing: Every mathematician should read this book and keep near to his/her desk.

item.title: My Thoughts
item.description: If you expect to have trust on significant other, be fully transparent: especially those things that you donâ€™t want to share. Let other significant decide the full dimension of love. Figure 1: March 20, 2016 Figure 1 is my attempt to embed an external image in an Rmarkdown file.
